fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
You keep your old abilities and gain the following
You get a chat with all the other apostles, they dont know you are the sinner
At night vote who to kill
You can multitask killing with your other new ability
Visit someone. If you visit One sin and a hundreds of good deeds (4387), all Apostles, WhiteNight and you will die.
While you are alive One sin and hundreds of goog deeds (4387) cannot die by any means

fields.name: Wincon:
fields.value: Stop WhiteNight from consuming the town.
